text: Susana Herrera Jord√°n (March 26, 1962 - November 2, 2019) was a ski athlete from Spain. She was born in Madrid, and lost her sight at the age of 23. She ws a type B1 ski athlete. She raced at the 1988 Winter Paralympics, where she finished first in the downhill race and third in the giant slalom race. == References == Category:Spanish skiers Category:2019 deaths Category:1962 births Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Spain Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:People from Madrid Category:1988 Winter Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B1
title: Susana Herrera
